senses.sense_definition: Designed to intercept and destroy another missile in flight.

examples.text: The navy deployed a ship equipped with an advanced <w>antimissile</w> defense system.
Engineers are working to improve <w>antimissile</w> technology to protect the borders.

senses.sense_definition: A missile or system designed to intercept and destroy another missile in flight.

examples.text: The base launched an <w>antimissile</w> to neutralize the incoming threat immediately.
Several <w>antimissiles</w> were tested in the desert to ensure their accuracy.
